posts.post_title: LOWER PRICE!! FS: 2 T206 Beauties! SHAW & SPADE (SOLD) SGC 40 VG 3!
posts.post_content:
11-20: BOTH CAN BE HAD FOR $55 DELIVERED!
11-24: SPADE SOLD

2 New selections from the Roy Mellinger Collection, which is dwindling down to the last 12 cards or so!

N54 thread re: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthr...highlight=t206[/url]

(1) T206 BOB SPADE-REDS PIED 150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here is a GORGEOUS EXAMPLE of BOB SPADE, pitcher for the CINCINNATI REDS.  VIRTUALLY SPOTLESS F & B, w/ LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SQUARED CORNERS.  Features a very COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. A QUALITY T206, TO BE SURE! $59 DELIVERED!

(2) T206 AL SHAW-STL CARDINALS SWEETCAP 150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!
 
Here's an OUTSTANDING EXAMPLE of AL SHAW, outfielder for the ST LOUIS CARDINALS. EYE APPEAL is 2nd to NONE, for sure! LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SQUARED CORNERS are evident, along w/ a BEAUTIFULLY COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. SPOTLESS F & B--AN OVERALL WONDERFUL T206! $59 DELIVERED

PM/EM me if interested in 1 or both! I will take all mail in order by time-stamp.

Thanks for looking--These are 2 Classy, Well Preserved T206's w/ a neat provenance.
Looking for a new home! VERY NICE & CLEAN!
NEW PRICE REDUCTION for these 2 BEAUTIES! Take a good look @ how NICE these both are, and the provenance is a neat story also!
